title: Fortnite Festival is getting local co-op, rekindling memories of Rock Band
description: Fortnite Festival, the concert-themed rhythm-action portion of Epic Games' free-to-play jack-of-all-trades juggernaut, is getting local co-op support next month - conjuring nostalgic memories of countless evenings spent twanging away in Rock Band with pals. Read more
author: Matt Wales

title: Switch 2 reportedly getting Halo and another big Xbox game, with Microsoft set to be a "very big supporter"
description: While the gaming world waits for Nintendo to finally reveal Switch 2, the rumours continue to swirl. And a reliable leaker has now claimed Microsoft will be a "very big supporter" of the console, bringing two major Xbox series to Switch 2 this year, including Halo. Read more
author: Matt Wales

title: Virtua Fighter 5 REVO PC Preorders Are 30% Off
description: Virtua Fighter will be available on Steam for the first time ever thanks to the new Virtua Fighter 5 REVO edition launching January 27. Fans can snag a discounted preorder for the Steam version at Fanatical, where the standard version is down to just $14 (was $20), and the 30th Anniversary edition that comes with tons of extra content is on sale for $35 (was $50).Preordering either version will get you three character customization items based on vintage Sega consoles like the Genesis, Saturn, and Dreamcast, that you can use to add some flair to your favorite fighter. Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. for Steam $14 (was $20) Virtua Fighter 5 REVO will support rollback netcode for online matches. This has become the preferred way to play fighting games online as it enables smoother battles worldwide, and its inclusion in Virtua Fighter 5 REVO put it on par with the netcode in other modern fighting games like Street Fighter 6. The game also supports a 4K resolution, updated textures, and numerous balance changes to the 19-character roster. Like a Dragon developer, Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio has also added new modes, including16-player online tournaments and leagues. Preorder at Fanatical Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. - 30th Anniversary Edition $35 (was $50) The 30th Anniversary version of Virtua Fighter 5 REVO comes with a lot of DLC. This package gets you 30th Anniversary-themed costumes for all characters, all Virtua Fighter titles original soundtracks and unreleased music, archival artwork, exclusive in-game rank titles, the Yakuza series Collaboration Pack DLC, and the Virtua Fighter Legendary Pack DLC. Preorder at Fanatical Disclosure: GameSpot and Fanatical are both owned by Fandom.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Candy Crush Solitaire Brings The Classic Card Game To The Massive Mobile Franchise
description: Candy Crush is getting another feather in its cap. Rather than offering another twist on match-three puzzling, Candy Crush Solitaire will bring the franchise's sickly sweet aesthetic to the card game classic. It will be the first Candy Crush game to release after Microsoft's acquisition of developer King.Candy Crush Solitaire bases itself on tripeaks solitaire, in which players must clear three "peaks" of cards. The game will feature familiar power-ups from Candy Crush, including jelly fish, the lollipop hammer, the color bomb, and the UFO. They will offer similar, but not exactly the same, powers as their match-three counterparts. Much like other Candy Crush games, the basic solitaire gameplay will be altered and made more challenging as players progress. Candy Crush Solitaire will launch worldwide on February 6. Players can pre-register now on the app store of their choice and they'll receive some in-game rewards: 5,000 Coins, four undos, two fish cards, and three color bomb cards.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: These solo tabletop RPGs will break your heart and put it back together
description: For at least the last decade, video games have been offering profound emotional single-player experiences, yet the recent surge of solo tabletop role-playing games has shown that pen & paper RPGs can be just as heartbreaking — if not more.  Traditionally, tabletop role-playing games have been opportunities for players to come together at the table […]

title: Hit city-builder Manor Lords has been updated with two new maps and a heap of changes
description: Slavic Magic and Hooded Horse have released a new Manor Lords update, adding a couple of maps, the ability to construct bridges, and a bevy of smaller features to an already quite robust medieval city builder. Read more
author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell

title: Era One is an enveloping space RTS from Homeworld modders that lets you clip together your own Mothership
description: If it seems like only last week that I was complaining there were too many gigantic space games, that's because it was only last week. Since then, I have written about Kerbal Space Program 2 and Space Engineers 2, because I am nothing if not a creature of contradictions. Now, here I am writing about Era One. In my defence, it's all your fault. Specifically, it's TheGreatOneSea's fault. They left a comment about Era One on our list of most-anticipated 2025 games, and reader, I Googled. Read more
author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell

title: Feeding Sodas To A Demonic Puppy Makes You Stronger In This New FPS
description: I’m nearly dead. Health is basically zero. I need help. So I step past a demonic dog and enter a dark, ominous bathroom. I quickly knock on the lone stall inside. It creaks open, I hear...something inside and then a single soda can rolls out. Instead of drinking it, however, I gamble, and knock again. And once again…Read more...

title: Kotaku Weekend Guide: 5 Great Games We Can’t Wait To Dive Into

But another one of my resolutions is to play more…Read more...

author: Joel Couture

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 863
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. If you could eat one food all day long, what would it be? Popcorn! If left to my own devices, I could easily have it for breakfast, lunch and dinner. 2. Who in your life is most like you? To be honest, probably my dog, Marnie. 3. Your current favorite store? Ooh, girl. You know you’ve crossed a bridge when you no longer want to hang out at Sephora or Nordstrom anymore. LOL! These days I’m all about Williams Sonoma (the fancy kitchen store)! Who wants to come with me to gawk at gadgets, dutch ovens and tableware? 4. What’s one thing you need to do today? Vacuum, although honestly I don’t know why I keep trying to keep the floors clean. Between the pets, friends and[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 863 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 845
description: Tabs was world renowned for his ambitious new year’s resolutions, whether it was training for the Iron Cat Triathlon, studying for the MCCATs (Medical Cat College Admission Test) or committing to walk in all four of the year’s big feline fashion shows — the so-called Grand Slam of kitty supermeowdelry. But his goals weren’t always epic. Sometimes, they were something simple… My darlings, The new year is upon us, and, with that, many new year’s resolutions. I was talking to a few kitty friends of mine, and one resolution that always pops up is getting fit. Believe it or not, despite my statuesque frame, fitness is something I actually have to work hard to achieve. This body doesn’t come naturally. Well…most of it does, but I do have to put in the work, and I believe in putting in the work, especially in the pursuit of purr-fection. Because you’re my favorite fans, here are my top tips to get in tip-top shape in 2016. Walking works! Don’t believe the hype: it’s not always about high-impact[Continue reading...] The post Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 845 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
